channel.title: Monitoring Minutes
channel.description: A daily briefing on Mexican monetary policy and macroeconomic developments. This AI-generated podcast transforms economic data into accessible insights, covering Banco de Mexico policy decisions, inflation trends, employment figures, and market expectations.
channel.itunes:author: Alexander Dentler
channel.itunes:summary: A daily briefing on Mexican monetary policy and macroeconomic developments. This AI-generated podcast transforms economic data into accessible insights, covering Banco de Mexico policy decisions, inflation trends, employment figures, and market expectations.
